name: Block Fruit Puzzle 2017
description:
Block Fruit Puzzle 2017 is one of the best block puzzle games!
The classic elimination game, the new play new game props!
Start your brain to play this game with millions of others players.
How to play:

- Drag the blocks to move them.
- Try to fit them all in the row or column. Then the block will be cleared and you get the score.
- Blocks can't be rotated.
- Game will be over if there are no room for any the shapes below the grid and you have no item.
